text.tspan: Aplicaciones de modelos numéricos de última generación,
en el ámbito del Servicio Meteorológico Nacional para el
pronóstico del tiempo. Estudios de vulnerabilidad del
(trilateral project among Japan, Argentina, and Chile)
ChEESE: Centre of Excellence for Exascale in Solid
VoHa: Volcanic ash hazard and forecast (PRACE)
Intelligent workflows in the future EuroHPC
DT-GEO: A Digital Twin for GEOphysical extremes
ChEESE-2P: Center of Excellence for Exascale in Solid
GET-IT: Geohazards Early Digital Twin Component
The GET-it project aims to design and test a Digital Twin
and other natural or anthropic origin geohazards)
exploiting multi-sensor EO data and AI techniques.
